00027 simsignal_t TTEInput::ctDroppedSignal = SIMSIGNAL_NULL;
00028 
00029 TTEInput::TTEInput(){
00030     hadError=false;

00033 void TTEInput::initialize()
00034 {
00035     ctDroppedSignal = registerSignal("ctDropped");
00036 }

00042 
00043 void TTEInput::handleMessage(cMessage *msg)
00044 {
00045     if (msg->arrivedOn("in"))
00046     {
00047         EtherFrame *frame = (EtherFrame*) msg;
00048         msg->addPar("received").setLongValue(((TTEScheduler*)getParentModule()->getParentModule()->getSubmodule("tteScheduler"))->getTicks());
00049         msg->addPar("received_total").setLongValue(((TTEScheduler*)getParentModule()->getParentModule()->getSubmodule("tteScheduler"))->getTotalTicks());
00050         //Auf CTCs verteilen oder BE traffic
00051         if (isCT(frame))
00052         {
00053             std::map<uint16, std::list<Incoming *> >::iterator incomingList = incomings.find(getCTID(frame));
00054             if (incomingList != incomings.end())
00055             {
00056                 //Send to all CTCs for the CT-ID
00057                 for (std::list<Incoming*>::iterator incoming = incomingList->second.begin(); incoming
00058                         != incomingList->second.end(); incoming++)
00059                 {
00060                     sendDirect(frame->dup(), (*incoming)->gate("in"));
00061                 }
00062                 delete frame;
00063             }
00064             else
00065             {
00066                 emit(ctDroppedSignal, 1);
00067                 hadError=true;
00068                 if(ev.isGUI()){
00069                     bubble("No matching buffer configured");
00070                     getDisplayString().setTagArg("i2", 0, "status/excl3");
00071                     getDisplayString().setTagArg("tt", 0, "WARNING: Input configuration problem - No matching buffer configured");
00072                     getParentModule()->getDisplayString().setTagArg("i2", 0, "status/excl3");
00073                     getParentModule()->getDisplayString().setTagArg("tt", 0, "WARNING: Input configuration problem - No matching buffer configured");
00074                     getParentModule()->getParentModule()->getDisplayString().setTagArg("i2", 0, "status/excl3");
00075                     getParentModule()->getParentModule()->getDisplayString().setTagArg("tt", 0, "WARNING: Input configuration problem - No matching buffer configured");
00076                 }
00077                 delete frame;
00078             }
00079         }
00080         //Sonst BE
00081         else
00082         {
00083             if(promiscuous || frame->getDest().isMulticast())
00084                 send(msg, "out");
00085         }
00086     }
00087 }
00088 
00089 void TTEInput::handleParameterChange(const char* parname){
00090     ctMask = (unsigned int)par("ct_mask").longValue();
00091     ctMarker = (unsigned int)par("ct_marker").longValue();
00092     promiscuous = par("promiscuous").boolValue();
00093 
00094     incomings.clear();
00095 
00096     std::string incomingsString = par("incomings").stdstringValue();
00097     std::vector<std::string> incomingPaths;
00098     split(incomingsString,',',incomingPaths);
00099     for(std::vector<std::string>::iterator incomingPath = incomingPaths.begin();
00100             incomingPath!=incomingPaths.end();incomingPath++){
00101         cModule* module = simulation.getModuleByPath((*incomingPath).c_str());
00102         if(module){
00103             Incoming *incoming = dynamic_cast<Incoming*> (module);
00104             if(incoming){
00105                 Buffer *buffer = dynamic_cast<Buffer*> (incoming->gate("out")->getPathEndGate()->getOwner());
00106                 if(buffer && buffer->hasPar("ct_id")){
00107                     incomings[buffer->par("ct_id").longValue()].push_back(incoming);
00108                 }
00109             }
00110         }
00111         else{
00112             if(ev.isGUI()){
00113                 ev<<"Configuration problem: Module "<<(*incomingPath)<<" could not be resolved or is no Incoming CTC Module, or module is not connected to a buffer!"<<endl;
00114                 getDisplayString().setTagArg("i2", 0, "status/excl3");
00115                 getDisplayString().setTagArg("tt", 0, "WARNING: Configuration Problem Input Buffers!");
00116             }
00117         }
00118     }
00119 }
00120 
00121 bool TTEInput::isCT(EtherFrame *frame)
00122 {
00123     unsigned char macBytes[6];
00124     frame->getDest().getAddressBytes(macBytes);
00125     //Check for ct
00126     if ((((macBytes[0] << 24) | (macBytes[1] << 16) | (macBytes[2] << 8) | (macBytes[3])) & ctMask) == (ctMarker
00127             & ctMask))
00128     {
00129         return true;
00130     }
00131     //TODO More checking ?
00132     return false;
00133 }
00134 
00135 uint16 TTEInput::getCTID(EtherFrame *frame)
00136 {
00137     unsigned char macBytes[6];
00138     frame->getDest().getAddressBytes(macBytes);
00139     return (macBytes[4] << 8) | macBytes[5];
00140 }
